title: case escalation CASE: 6-7985000030629
content: Con someone help me with my case. I was promised to look for an email for phone replacement 2 days ago. I was told I would receive a replacement. I was to wait for 2 emails, one to confirm I wanted "advance replacement" and one with return shipping label for the defective phoned. It has been 2 days and I have heard nothing. Can someone please help? I need an operable phone for my business. CASE ID 6-7985000030629.   Thank you, Jason Hopper.
